name: initialize
attributes: # [doc = " ホワイトリストアカウントの初期化"]
body: let wl = & mut ctx . accounts . whitelist ;
wl . authority = * ctx . accounts . authority . key ;
wl . mint = * ctx . accounts . mint . to_account_info () . key ;
wl . bump = bump ;
wl . entries = Vec :: new () ;

name: add_member
attributes: # [doc = " ホワイトリストへのアドレス追加"]
body: let wl = & mut ctx . accounts . whitelist ;
wl . entries . push (member) ;

name: remove_member
attributes: # [doc = " ホワイトリストからアドレス削除"]
body: let wl = & mut ctx . accounts . whitelist ;
wl . entries . retain (| x | x != & member) ;

name: mint_nft
attributes: # [doc = " ホワイトリスト済みアドレスによるNFTミント"]
body: let wl = & ctx . accounts . whitelist ;
let user_key = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;
require ! (wl . entries . contains (& user_key) , WhitelistError :: NotWhitelisted) ;
let seeds = & [b"whitelist" , wl . mint . as_ref () , & [wl . bump]] ;
let signer = & [& seeds [..]] ;

let cpi_accounts = MintTo { mint : ctx . accounts . mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_token_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . whitelist . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts , signer ,) ;
mint_to (cpi_ctx , 1) ? ;

fields.name: whitelist
fields.attribute: # [account (init , seeds = [b"whitelist" , mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump = bump , payer = authority , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + 1 + 4 + 100 * 32 ,)]

fields.name: mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ミントをPDAの権限に設定済みであることを保証"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: whitelist
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"whitelist" , whitelist . mint . as_ref ()] , bump = whitelist . bump , has_one = authority ,)]

fields.name: whitelist
fields.attribute: # [account (seeds = [b"whitelist" , whitelist . mint . as_ref ()] , bump = whitelist . bump ,)]

fields.name: user_token_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , constraint = user_token_account . owner == user . key () , constraint = user_token_account . mint == whitelist . mint ,)]
